projects.title: The World Cook
projects.description: An interactive cookbook for the 2018 FIFA World Cup featuring recipes for all 32 represented teams. Development, design and photography

projects.title: Monthly Mix
projects.description: Design and development for a personal project that showcases the newest music from each month. Listeners can subscribe to monthly newsletters and listen on the website

projects.title: Go Set A Watchman Extract
projects.description: Art direction, design and development for an exclusive extract of Harper Lee’s new novel

projects.title: The Guardian
projects.description: Design and development for the new fully responsive theguardian.com, mainly focused on the fronts

projects.title: BBC Archive
projects.description: D&AD award winning entry that pitched a more interactive and representive version of the BBC Archive

otherProjects.title: Rothko Me
otherProjects.description: An experiment with CSS filters based on the art of Mark Rothko

otherProjects.title: Qhuery
otherProjects.description: A CSS colour picker using only media queries

otherProjects.title: US Midterms 2018 Results
otherProjects.description: Live results page for 2018 US Midterms

otherProjects.title: Black Radicals – in pictures
otherProjects.description: Archive photography and video provide historic background for a series on black radicials
